description:
Kenshiro hits secret pressure points on Peji and Giji, wielders of the South Star Twin Cutting Swords, then finally faces Souther.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Am Souther, the Holy Emperor! I Disallow Love and Compassion!
Ore wa Seitei Souther! Ai mo Jou mo Yurusanai!!
俺は聖帝サウザー! 愛も情も許さない!!
